participant_1.background:
I don't have a car but I do enjoy riding my bike.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
I'm from LA, and I like to wear comfortable clothes because I'm always on the go.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure if Comic Con is my thing
My dog is well fed and happy.
I'm going to try a new recipe for a healthy snack for my kids.
I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
I chew my nails even though I know it's not good for me.

content.text: Hey! I'm from LA, how about you?
Hi! I live in LA too. Are you from here?
Yes, I was born and raised here. I love it here.
Me too! There's so much to do here.
Right? I love going to the beach, biking, and swimming.
I love the beach too. I love swimming. I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to bike on the streets here though.
Yeah, the streets can be pretty scary. But it's so much fun to bike around.
Maybe I'll give it a try. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog. She's a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and cute.
They are! She's the best dog ever.
I have two cats. They're always getting into trouble.
Cats are so funny. They always seem to be up to something.
Yeah, they are. But I love them anyway.
